title: Place for all Summoners! :D

embed.description: Step up your game with a modern voice & text chat app. Crystal clear voice, multiple server and channel support, mobile apps, and more. Get your free server now!

body:
**Summoners Lodge!**

https://discord.gg/ECPwgdd
-Coaching
-Team play
-No toleration disrespect policies!
-Fun Community, welcoming, always wanting to play,
-500+ members right now :P 
-lotteries, events, tournaments 24/7 
Hello! We just started 21 days ago and already have 500+ members! Wanna find games easier? Or people to play with? Compete in tournaments, or be in lotteries to win skins, or various prizes almost everyday? You love Lore of League? JOIN US! 
https://discord.gg/ECPwgdd

We have a lot of fun here, hopefully you will too ;D 
Anti flame- environment, we want it fun accross the board for all players, come check us out :3 
https://discord.gg/ECPwgdd

Teams- I will eventually be getting teams together from all Elos. To play for fun, but some also for competitive, but I'm looking to grow our population first :)
https://discord.gg/ECPwgdd

replies.body: This is good discord. Veri love. Much happi. Such sugoi

I love this place, super friendly, great place to make new friends, and if you play league and don't like to play alone, you will be amazed when you walk into the summonses lodge, there is always someone looking for a game. Great things to come in the near future, I really look forward to watching this discord grow!
THE DISCORD DOES NOT WORK.. PLEASE FIX..
I received a very warm welcome when joining. Everyone has been friendly and I expect to spend a lot of time in this discord.

Possibly the best discord i've been in a very loving community that will make you feel like your at home with your family personally. Very proffesional server on top of it with very big visions of a future i would highly recommend joining.
true dataroni
Third <3
Welcoming all human and robots to join
First :D Best discord server tbh {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Hope y'all join us!! :3
Second.
So far this server has been pretty nice!
Amazing people in this discord
Tons of people in every channel and a warm welcome the second I hopped in, amazing discord!
Pretty organised! Love it so far.
Looking forward to being part of the community. Seems fun so far.
We allow everyone here! Except we have strong rules against toxicity, flaming and disrespect. We are a community based around making friends! Not trolling or degrading them!
I find it neat how they have faction wars and stuff, nice people as well!
Hellos~
Super nice people here :)
